etymology.description: 大(大) (dà, "great") and 同(同) (tóng, "same; unity") form 大同(大同) (dàtóng, "great unity") which is a concept and name. This is combined with 區(區) (qū, "district") to refer to a specific district in Taipei.
etymology.interpretation: The combination 大同(大同) (dàtóng, "great unity") with 區(區) (qū, "district") names a district in Taipei, suggesting a place embodying principles of unity or harmony.

examples.chinese: 我住在大同区(我住在大同區)。
大同区以美食出名(大同區以美食出名)，吸引了众多旅客(吸引了眾多旅客)。
examples.pinyin: Dàtóng Qū yǐ měishí chūmíng, xīyǐnle zhòngduō lǚkè.
examples.english: Datong District is famous for its cuisine, attracting many tourists.

examples.chinese: 大同区有悠久的历史(大同區有悠久的歷史)，还是台北的重要文化区(還是臺北的重要文化區)。
examples.pinyin: Dàtóng Qū yǒu yōujiǔ de lìshǐ, háishi Táiběi de zhòngyào wénhuà Qū.
examples.english: Datong District has a long history and is also an important cultural district in Taipei.
